Reference

All functions

build_pipeline()

Build generic pipeline

calc_covariates()

Calculate covariates

calc_ecoregion()

Calculate EPA Ecoregions level 2/3 binary variables

calc_koppen_geiger()

Calculate Koeppen-Geiger climate zone binary variables

calc_modis()

Calculate MODIS product covariates in multiple CPU threads

calc_nei()

Calculate National Emission Inventory (NEI) covariates

calc_nlcd_ratio()

Compute land cover classes ratio in circle buffers around points

calc_temporal_dummies()

Calculate temporal dummy variables

calc_tri()

Calculate TRI covariates

check_crs_is_valid()

Check if the output is with the valid coordinate reference system

check_data_completeness()

Check if the output covariates are complete

check_input_raster_in_extent()

Check if the input raster is in the expected extent

check_means_are_valid()

Check if the output prediction mean values are in the valid range

check_output_locs_are_valid()

Check output locations are in the reference spatial domain of the mainland US

check_variances_are_valid()

Check if the output prediction variances are non-negative

convert_stdt()

Convert a stdt to sf/sftime/SpatVector

convert_stdt_sftime()

Convert a stdtobj to sftime

convert_stdt_spatrastdataset()

Convert a stdtobj to SpatRasterDataset

convert_stdt_spatvect()

Convert a stdt to SpatVector

convert_stobj_to_stdt()

Convert spatio-temporal object to a datatable with lon, lat, time, predictors columns. It also returns the crs.

dt_to_sf()

Create a sf object from a data.table

dt_to_sftime()

Create a sftime object from a data.table

generic_base_learner()

Generic script to apply a base learner to data and then a meta learner

generic_meta_learner()

Generic meta learner

is_stdt()

Boolean to know if an object correspond to a stdtobj

meta_learner_fit()

Fit a BART (Bayesian Additive Regression Tree) meta learner. It takes predictions of other models such as kriging, GLM, machine learning models as input and fits a BART Model

meta_learner_predict()

Create meta_learner predictions from the list of BART fit objects and predictions of base learners

modis_aggregate_sds()

Aggregate layers in a MODIS sub-dataset

modis_get_vrt()

Get mosaicked or merged raster from multiple MODIS hdf files

modis_mosaic_mod06()

Mosaic MODIS MOD06_L2 product files

modis_prefilter_sds()

Selected MODIS product subdataset name selector

modis_preprocess_vnp46()

Assign MODIS VNP46 corner coordinates to retrieve a merged raster

modis_warp_stars()

Warp MODIS Swath data into rectilinear grid raster

modis_worker()

A single-date MODIS worker for parallelization

project_dt()

Project coordinates in a datatable from crs_ori to crs_dest

Contents
